Name: Sci-Fi
Description: Advanced technology, space travel, and aliens.

Name: Cyberpunk
Description: High tech, low life. Dystopian futures.

Name: Western
Description: Gunslingers and lawlessness on the frontier.

Name: Post-Apocalyptic
Description: Surviving in a ruined world after the fall.

Name: Superhero
Description: Extraordinary individuals saving (or ruling) the world.

Name: Steampunk
Description: Victorian era aesthetics with steam technology.

Name: Universal
Description: The core rules applicable to all worlds.
